title: Anzac biscuits with ginger
ingredients: ['1/2 tablespoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 tablespoons boiling water', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '125g butter', '250g porridge oats', '250g plain flour', '250g soft brown sugar', '250g dessicated coconut', '2 teaspoons ground ginger (or 1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger)']
